title: Social Networking-Based Collaborative Learning for Design and Technology Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Course for professional learners in medical/legal/technical fields to strengthen design problem-solving skills through social interaction in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can produce one prototype that solves a real-world social problem by applying the design thinking process.
Learners can improve their design solutions at least three times through peer assessment and feedback on social networking platforms.
Learners can present technology-design integrated solutions at least once through cross-domain collaboration.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
